text:
This content is imported from poll. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

Khloé Kardashian is days away from becoming a mother for the first time. The reality star and designer shared some thoughts about her pregnancy and impending deep dive into motherhood in a post on her app this week.

"I can't believe my little girl will be here soon! These past nine months have flown by, and I've loved every minute of it," she wrote. "After my first trimester everything has been a breeze," she added, referencing the early struggles in her pregnancy that she documented on Keeping Up With the Kardashians.

In the post, Khloé told fans that her biggest fear about becoming a parent is that she "won't have time to do it all."

More From Harper's BAZAAR

According to E Online, K is currently in Cleveland, Ohio with her boyfriend Tristan Thompson preparing for the birth of their daughter.

Last week, Khloé posted a picture of herself and Tristan on Instagram with the caption, "Mommy and Daddy."

The star has posted several pictures throughout her pregnancy highlighting her growing stomach and undeniable glow. Like this picture in lingerie:

And this one in a crop top and a pair of her own Good American maternity jeans (the line is called "Good Mamas"):

Khloé also shared pictures from her baby shower:

And her recent trip to Japan with sisters Kim and Kourtney:

Khloé's most iconic picture from her pregnancy, however, remains her announcement photo. The black and white shot showed her pregnant belly being cradled by Tristan's protective arms (and a shoutout to Calvin Klein, which the Kardashians and Jenners now represent).
title: Khloé Kardashian Reveals Her Biggest Parenting Fear
